sentence.Network_en: Glauconite, detrital carbonate skeletal debris, marine fossils, and collophane are commonly present.
sentence.Network_cn: 海绿石 、 碳酸盐骨骸碎屑 、 海相化石和胶磷矿普遍出现.

sentence.Network_en: The Glauconite Sandstone is a persistent stratigraphic unit.
sentence.Network_cn: 海绿石砂岩是一个稳定的地层单元.

sentence.Network_en: Glauconite, hematite - limonite and some chlorite are formed in syndiagenesis.
sentence.Network_cn: 形成于同生成岩期的自生矿物有海绿石, 赤铁矿 ～ 褐铁矿和部分绿泥石.

list.abs: ...eriod）中新世（Miocene）上段、至上新世（Pliocene）下段形成的地层，总厚1,200米，由泥质岩（pelyte）、海绿石砂岩（glauconitic sandstone）、凝灰质砂岩（tuffsandstone）组成，含褐煤和油层。上层（覆盖层）由凝灰岩（tuff）与凝灰砂岩组成，夹有薄煤层.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from German Glaukonit, from Greek glaukon (neuter of glaukos 'bluish-green') + -ite

means.word_mean: 1. a green mineral consisting of hydrated silicate of potassium or iron or magnesium or aluminum; found in greensand
